lensconstruction: 10 elements in 7 groups (with one aspherical lens element)
weight: Approx. 600 g/21.2 oz. (Based on CIPA Guidelines)
pictureangle: 63° with 35 mm (135) format Nikon film SLR cameras and Nikon FX format digital SLR cameras 44° with Nikon DX format digital SLR cameras
focusing: Autofocus with a built-in SWM and manual focus
